special_rules: Binary Division: Only 2 infantry regiments vs. standard 3

validation.methodology: Bottom-up calculation from standard Italian binary infantry division TO&E with adjustments for North African deployment. Personnel and equipment counts derived from US G-2 intelligence documentation and German operational records (November 1941 OOB). Cross-referenced with Nafziger Collection Italian division templates.
validation.data_quality_notes: Personnel totals based on standard North African binary division at full strength (10,978 men). Equipment counts calculated from regimental/battalion establishments and confirmed against November 1941 German records. Artillery regiment composition (12th Sila) confirmed from US G-2 intelligence. Tank company (13x L3/33) documented as lost in transit per German OOB. Division destroyed January 17, 1942 at Halfaya Pass per multiple sources.
